item.description:
7/23/2010 TICKETS ARE SOLD OUT FOR THIS EVENT, IF YOU HAVE NOT PREVIOUSLY ORDERED YOUR TICKET YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ATTEND










Update 7/20/2010: Tickets are going fast so if you want to attend this event, please log on to the website and purchase your tickets: http://www.tewksburyc....
We will not be holding a table as we would have to advance reserve, so if someone gets there when the doors open, please try to reserve a table for our group, I will also try to arrive early.

IF you want to take a line dancing lesson, please arrive for the 7:30 class.




Country Western Hoe Down is coming to Tewksbury Country Club. This will be a pay ahead event, which will sell out fast.

As we find out more information we will post it so keep your eye on the site.
item.name: YEEEEHAAAAWWWW we are going to a Country Ho down
